FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_1: EthExplorer is a platform to find and explore the latest Ethereum blockchain projects.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_2: Our mission is to make it easy for developers, investors, and enthusiasts to stay up-to-date with the rapidly evolving Ethereum ecosystem.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_3: Join our community of blockchain explorers today.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_4: Learn more about our team and story.
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Ready to discover new Ethereum blockchains?
CONTACT_FORM_TEXT_FIELD_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: How Did You Hear About Us?
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Don't just take our word for it - hear from developers using EtherChain.
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: EtherChain has been instrumental in helping me find and connect to new Ethereum blockchain networks. The easy-to-use interface makes exploring the blockchain ecosystem a breeze.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As someone constantly working with different Ethereum testnets, EtherChain has saved me countless hours by making it simple to discover and switch between networks.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Whether I'm building a new dapp or just experimenting, EtherChain gives me access to the Ethereum networks I need, when I need them. It's become an essential tool in my workflow.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Stay ahead of the curve by easily finding and exploring the latest Ethereum-based blockchain projects as they launch.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Get comprehensive data and insights on new blockchains, including tokenomics, developer activity, and community engagement metrics.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Based on your interests and investment criteria, receive tailored suggestions for promising up-and-coming blockchain projects to investigate.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Gain early access to new blockchain token sales, airdrops, and other opportunities before mainstream awareness.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Seamlessly connect with developer tools and resources for building on the latest blockchain platforms from day one.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Get in-depth reports and commentary from our team of blockchain experts on the most compelling new projects.
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Ethereum Blockchain Discovery App
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What is this app used for?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app helps users discover and connect to new and upcoming Ethereum blockchain networks. Whether you're a developer, investor, or enthusiast, our platform provides a central place to find information on the latest Ethereum-based projects.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: We constantly scan and index data from various sources to identify new Ethereum blockchain launches. Our app then organizes and presents key details about each network, such as its purpose, roadmap, team, and tech specs.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: What kind of blockchains can I find?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Our app covers a wide range of Ethereum blockchain initiatives, from decentralized apps and finance projects to enterprise solutions and experimental test networks. Both public and private/permissioned networks are included.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Is the app free to use?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Yes, our Ethereum blockchain discovery app is completely free for all users. We plan to keep it an open resource to support innovation and growth in the Ethereum ecosystem.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common questions about finding and exploring new Ethereum ecosystems
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: This app helps you discover and learn about new Ethereum-based blockchain networks beyond just the main Ethereum chain. With so many Layer 2 solutions, sidechains, and application-specific chains being built, it can be hard to keep track. Our app curates the latest Ethereum-compatible networks.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: We constantly monitor the Ethereum ecosystem for new blockchain launches. Our team vets and adds promising networks to the app, providing key details like the purpose, tech specs, tokenomics, and roadmap for each chain.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: What kind of networks are included?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: We cover all the major Layer 2 scaling solutions like Optimism, Arbitrum, Polygon and their associated DeFi ecosystems. We also track Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) compatible appchains focused on gaming, metaverse, DeFi, NFTs and more.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Is the app free to use?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Yes, the app is completely free to download and use. We plan to add premium research reports and analysis in the future, but core network discovery will always be free.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: How can I get updates on new network launches?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: You can enable push notifications within the app to get alerted whenever we add major new Ethereum-based blockchain networks. We also have a newsletter you can subscribe to for weekly updates.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Explore the latest and most innovative Ethereum-based blockchains with our cutting-edge platform. Stay ahead of the curve and uncover emerging opportunities.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Gain valuable insights into new blockchain projects through comprehensive analysis of their technology, roadmap, and team. Make informed decisions backed by data.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Be among the first to adopt promising new Ethereum blockchains. Our platform empowers you to identify and capitalize on ground-floor opportunities.
CTA_BODY: Stay ahead of the curve with our cutting-edge platform that helps you uncover the latest and most promising Ethereum-based blockchain projects before anyone else.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Stay ahead of the curve with our cutting-edge platform for exploring the latest Ethereum blockchain projects.

STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: Stay ahead of the curve with EtherExplorer. Our platform scours the web for the latest Ethereum-based blockchain projects, giving you early access to groundbreaking decentralized applications and investment opportunities. Join today and unlock a world of innovation.
HERO_SUBTITLE: Stay ahead of the curve with our curated list of promising new Ethereum networks.
LANDING_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT_TEXT: Discover the Next Big Ethereum Blockchain
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Our platform helps you explore and evaluate the most innovative Ethereum blockchains before they hit the mainstream.
